deploymentRegion.value: { The Azure region to deploy to. Lower case, no spaces. Example: eastus. See: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/global-infrastructure/geographies/#geographies }

aadTenantId.value: { The Azure tenant ID that your Azure account belongs to. This is a GUID value. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/find-tenant-object-id#find-tenant-id }

subscriptionId.value: { The subscription ID to deploy to. This is a GUID string. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/find-tenant-object-id#find-subscriptions-and-roles }

solutionName.value: { The name of the deployment. Ex: my-simulation }

adminUsername.value: { The user name for the Azure VM that will run Simulation. Ex: myUser. See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/faq#what-are-the-username-requirements-when-creating-a-vm }

containerRepositoryPrefix.value: { Docker container repository name. Ex: myRepository }
